title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger        Lewis and Clark NHT junior ranger patch NPS   Â    Attention Teachers: Completing the Junior Ranger questions as a class is encouraged. We will honor your entire class with a Junior Ranger Class Stewardship certificate and patch. Please ensure each student has met the minimum eligibility requirements for the program, then mail all programs together as a class. Your class certificate and patch will be sent back to you as soon as the booklets are reviewed by a ranger at the trail office. Good luck and have fun! Thank you for learning about the Lewis and Clark story.
